data.description: Neotrie VR enables users to create, manipulate, and interact with 3D geometrical objects and 3D models in general, of several types. It also allows teachers to create VR scenes with activities for their math classes.

changelog.change_log:
Implemented label “Formula” allowing operations with entries other labels.  For this, write in the new label the following text to make the sum of the values on labels e1 and e2:

 [Formula= <label=e1>+<label=e2>]

Intersection of STLs and parametric surfaces, available in multiplayer mode.
New level curves shown option in the 3d Graphing calculator.
New conics tool (advanced license).

Fixed bug on saving and loading hidden green points.
Fixed bug on saving and loading points with interpolation.

Intersection of figures improved.
Intersection of STL/Obj improved.
Intersection of formulas from the 3d graphing calculator improved.

New activities available on the website are automatically updated.
Improved touching of the universal menu buttons.
Fixed bug on loading older files.
Fixed bug on saving files with labels.
Fixed bug on loading clones with labels.

Loading pictures, videos, STL/OBJ objects, etc. synchronized in multiplayer mode.
Fixed bug on loading older files.

Extrusion with both hands improved to change size. 
Unlink tool with figure option synchronized in multiplayer mode. 
Loading labels of type <button loadfile=...> synchronized in multiplayer mode.
Pasting figures synchronized in multiplayer mode.

We are working so that the next version will be able to pass neot files, STL, photos, videos, etc. in multiplayer mode. Please stay tuned. In the meantime if you find bugs, let us know.

Fixed bug on moving figures with green points.
Improved rotations with hidden vertices.
Can_Edit_Labels boolean added in other settings. 
Fixed bug loading labels attached to mathitems.
Loading Neot files and copying figures with hidden elements appear now  hidden.
Version work in progress. Some moves of figures can fail.

Clones are loaded in multiplayer mode.
Fixed bug on saving and loading neot files with config.
Fixed bug in fractal tool.
Fixed bug in scaled copy tool.
Included scale copy tool in beginner license for testing.
If vertices are hidden, figures appear with hidden vertices when copied or uploaded.
Fixed bug on introducing decimal numbers with “,” or “.”.

New scrollbar in the menus.
Fixed bug on teleporting to a place.
Fixed bug on deleting objects STL, OBJ, photos, drawings, etc. in multiplayer mode.
Fixed bug on copying objects in multiplayer mode.
Fixed bug on moving drawings in multiplayer mode.
Fixed bug on button down in scale copying tool.
Fixed bug on loading labels assigned to Mathitems and objects.
Allowed flying speed to be 0.

Jump angle of the rotation tool works with keyboard.
Selection tool changed to only yellow.
Fixed bug when downloading STL objects.

Fixed bug: Fractals.
Fixed bug loading files with STLs.

Fixed bug: Free drawings synchronize well in multiplayer mode.
Fractal too is under recovery.
Be aware that all players in a lobby must be active during the synchronization.

Fixed bug importing STL internally.
Fixed bug on the eraser tool.
Fixed bug on the scale copy tool.
Improved player joystick rotation.
New activities in the box of the Erasmus project Geometrician’s Views. For that “clear activities” and download.

Trails of points and edges(with the loci pencil) synchronized in multiplayer mode.
Fixed bug when releasing objects.
Fixed bug loading labels assigned to MathItems.
Labels assigned to images, videos, sounds, drawings, 360 balls, etc., are saved and loaded in Neot files.
Save and load 360 environment pictures on 360 balls in Neot files.

4.3.6 
Important bug fixed: using tools and hand actions.
Fixed bug on copy tool.
Fixed bug on calculus of volumes.
Fixed bug on label tool.
Fixed bug on scaling objects with both hands.
Added restrictions on scaling of figures in the axis of coordinates (advanced).

Fixed bug on copy tool.
Fixed bug on calculus of volumes.
Fixed bug on label tool.
Fixed bug on scaling objects with both hands.
Added restrictions on scaling of figures in the axis of coordinates (advanced).

Fixed bug: Division tool works well again.
Fixed bug: Information of figures length, area and volume is shown.
Fixed bug: Creating point extrusions
Bug: Rotation and grabbing of big figures is slow.
